R

refreshStock(int, int) - Method in class game.Shop
Uses Generation to generate 3 random Monster objects for the shop and 6 Item objects, using the current day and difficulty.
refreshTeam() - Method in class game.Player
Full reset of the team's status (set health to full and remove status effects, etc.).
removeItem(Item) - Method in class game.Player
Removes an Item from the inventory.
removeMonster(Monster) - Method in class game.Player
remove a monster from the team.
resetStatusEffects() - Method in class game.monsters.FlyingMonster
Set's isFlying to false, then calls base class method.
resetStatusEffects() - Method in class game.monsters.Monster
Resets all status effects by clearing the damage buffs and persitent damage attacks.
rest() - Method in class game.monsters.FlyingMonster
Resets status effects and calls base class method.
rest() - Method in class game.monsters.Monster
Sets health to max, sets the monster to awake and removes any status effects.
reward() - Method in class game.monsters.Monster
Rewards the monster with xp based on the value of wasActiveDuringBattle, using rewardXP and passiveXP, should be called only after battles.
rewardPostBattle(int, int, boolean) - Method in class game.Player
Rewards each monster in the team with xp, and rewards the player with an increased score, and if the battle was not a wild battle, also rewards the player with gold.
RiskyMonster - Class in game.monsters
A special type of Monster, with a second attack which instant kills either the enemy or itself randomly.
RiskyMonster(String, int) - Constructor for class game.monsters.RiskyMonster
Calls the Monster constructor, and then adds the attack string of the one shot attack.
run(GameEnvironment) - Method in class commandline.InventoryCommandLine
Displays the player's inventory and promts the user to return to the prievious menu or use one of the items.
run(GameEnvironment) - Method in class commandline.Main
Runs each day, displaying information to the player, performing pre day logic, post day logic and within each day taking input to decide which action to take and delegating each action to other classes e.g.
run(GameEnvironment, boolean, int) - Method in class commandline.BattleCommandLine
Comman line interface to run a battle, runs pre battle logic, each turn with makeMove() and Player.makeRandomMove() and handles the rewards if the player wins the battle.
